Methods in org.netbeans.spi.wizard with parameters of type Wizard
 void Wizard.WizardListener.navigabilityChanged(Wizard wizard)
          Called when the enablement of the next/previous/finish buttons change, or the problem text changes.
 void Wizard.WizardListener.stepsChanged(Wizard wizard)
          Called when a change in the number or names of the steps of the wizard changes (for example, the user made a choice in one pane which affects the flow of subsequent steps).
